pages.text: Grim beings crawling straight from the pits of Hell, Demons are usually $(l:bewitchment:rituals/summon_demon)Summoned$() and will attack any living being around them with fire, and are weak to Smite.$(br2)Demons can be safely approached with $(l:bewitchment:tools/besmirched_armor)Besmirched Armor$(), offering $(l:bewitchment:contracts/concept_contracts)Contracts$().$(br2)Slaying a Demon will yield at least one Demon Heart.
